definition: to inhabit a region (esp. ethnic group)/to congregate
to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
surname Ju
inhabited land/habitat

sentences.english: The second part is about the machine-processd components of settlement form in the ancient towns of Bayu.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分为巴渝古镇聚居形态的构成机制研究。

sentences.english: The old house our clan had lived in for so many years had already been sold.
sentences.chinese: 我们多年聚居的老屋，已经卖给别姓了。

sentences.english: It is a region inhabited by an overwhelming majority of the Korean minority nationality in China.
sentences.chinese: 长白山区，是我国朝鲜族同胞的主要聚居地。

sentences.english: This is the first time that the outbreak of demonstrations in cities and towns inhabited by Arabs.
sentences.chinese: 今次亦是首次有阿拉伯人聚居城镇爆发示威。

sentences.english: Western Guizhou is inhabited by many minority nationalities living in compact communities.
sentences.chinese: 黔西是一个少数民族聚居地。
时至今日，这些聚居区依然如故。

sentences.english: Shangqiu is the original settlement of the Shang Tribe.
sentences.chinese: 商丘是商族的起源和聚居地。

sentences.english: The forth part is the considers and exploration about integration of settlement form in the ancient towns of Bayu.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分为对古镇聚居形态的整合思考与探索。

sentences.english: Village refers to the homes habitation for the living and various productions of the villagers.
sentences.chinese: 村庄是指农村村民居住和从事各种生产的聚居点。

sentences.english: Hongyuan:Hongyuan is the only complete grassland farming county in A Ba which is Tibet's habitation.
sentences.chinese: 红原红原是阿坝州唯一的以藏族聚居为主的纯牧业县。

sentences.english: The Mai Po Marshes form one of the most important wildlife conservation sites in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 米埔沼泽区是本港野生动物的主要聚居地之一。

sentences.english: New York is a vast melting-pot of different nationalities.
sentences.chinese: 纽约是不同国籍的人的聚居地。

sentences.english: Tujia ethnic group in Hubei mainly lives in the compact communities of Wuling mountain area.
sentences.chinese: 湖北土家族长期聚居在鄂西武陵山区。

sentences.english: The She Nationality is a main minority in Fujian, which mostly inhabits in Ningde, East Fujian.
sentences.chinese: 畲族大多聚居于福建省东部的宁德市。

sentences.english: This shows that by the late primitive society, Jingxing territory has been inhabited by human beings.
sentences.chinese: 这表明最迟在原始社会晚期，井陉境内已有人类聚居。

sentences.english: Seventeen thousand Indians live in Arizona on a reservation .
sentences.chinese: 一万七千名印第安人居住在亚利桑那州的聚居地。

to settle (in some city, country etc)/to take up residence

to reside/to dwell/to live in a place/resident in
